Overview.Description: Packaging Unreal game projects for distribution.
Overview.Purpose: Ensure all code and content is up to date and in the proper format for the target platform.

Steps.Cooking: Convert content into a format usable by the target platform.
Steps.Bundling: Bundle compiled code and cooked content into distributable files.

Package_Project_Options.Platforms: List of supported platforms for packaging.

Steps: Click Edit > Project Settings > Maps & Modes.
Set the Game Default Map to load on startup.
Packaging process runs in background with status indicator.

Distribution.iOS: Create Distribution Certificate and MobileProvision on Apple's developer website.
Distribution.Android: Create key to sign .apk file and configure SigningConfig.xml.

Options.Description: Select DebugGame for debugging, Development for performance, Shipping for final build.
Compile all code for shipping builds.
Generate .pak file chunks for streaming installs.
Generate data for HTTP chunk installer.
Directory for HTTP chunk install data.
Version name for HTTP chunk install data.

Signing_and_Encryption.Description: Sign or encrypt .pak files using OpenSSL.

Content_Cooking.Description: Cook content for target platform without packaging.

Methods.Method: Event Driven Loader (EDL) and Asynchronous Loading Thread (ALT)
Methods.Description: Activate ALT in Project Settings for faster loading.
Enable compression in Project Settings > Packaging.
